name: Empi
description: Empi (or Enpi) means 'flying swallow' or 'swallow in flight', which is symbolized by the quick up and down movements in the kata. It originates from Tomari-Te, is one of the oldest in Shōtōkan and was previously called 'Wanshū'. The kata is characterized by transitioning from high to low positions, as light as a swallow, with fast and agile movements and quick flipping of body position.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Stand in Heisoku-dachi, left hand on left hip (back facing left), right fist touching the left palm (back of fist forward).

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken gedan barai – hidari ken migi mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: みぎあし おんしく
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎあし おんしく
subMoves.description: Drop down on right knee (one hand width between left foot and right knee) - block 45 degrees right gedan barai - hikite hand also lies 45 degrees in front of solar plexus - gaze follows

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち (ひろく)
subMoves.description: Quickly up koshi-kamae (hands on right side) in shizentai. During the pull-up - gaze is held 45 degrees

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: To the right side right gedan barai in zenkutsu-dachi. No hikite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり かぎづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Left hook punch in horse stance - keep gaze to the right. To create power in kagi zuki, make sharp rotation in the hips while pulling the left foot in

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Straight forward left gedan barai in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right rising punch to high level, same stance. Age-zuki is performed by moving the hips to shomen while punching chūdan and immediately raising the hand to jōdan

moves.japaneseName: Kami zukami / Fumikomi / Kōsa dachi – migi jōdan nagashi uke / hidari chūdan otoshi zuki

subMoves.hiragana: かみづかみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Hand opens (as if to grab a ponytail), right knee pulls up and stamps down fumikomi

subMoves.hiragana: ふみこみ / ながしうけ / おとしづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: こうさだち
subMoves.description: Cross stance with right high level deflecting block and left middle level dropping punch

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うしろ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees opposite right reverse low block in left zenkutsu-dachi. With right heel as pivot point, extend right leg completely and powerfully while rotating thigh and torso counterclockwise

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward direction left gedan barai in same stance. Body vertical as normal

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right rising punch to high level in same stance

moves.japaneseName: Kami zukami / Fumikomi / Kōsa dachi – migi jōdan nagashi uke / hidari chūdan otoshi zuki

subMoves.hiragana: かみづかみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Hand opens (as if to grab a ponytail), right knee pulls up and stamps down fumikomi

subMoves.hiragana: ふみこみ / ながしうけ / おとしづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: こうさだち
subMoves.description: Cross stance with right high level deflecting block and left middle level dropping punch

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うしろ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees opposite right reverse low block in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward direction left gedan barai in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Front leg moves slowly up and in an arc to the left down into horse stance simultaneously with high level back hand block 45 degrees to the left. Arms and legs must move synchronously and slowly in an arc

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん てくびさしうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Right high level wrist strike into left palm, right foot pulls in at left knee, balance on left leg. KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん たて しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Slowly down to horse stance - left middle level vertical knife hand block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん づき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level punch - same stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん づき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Left middle level punch - same stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: To the left, left gedan barai in zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right high level rising punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: In the same place - front foot back, then forward left middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level reverse punch in back stance (stance unchanged)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees around left gedan barai in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right high level rising punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward direction left gedan barai in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ていしょう ちゅうだん おしあげうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right palm heel block towards 45 degrees - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi teishō chūdan oshi age-uke – hidari teishō gedan oshi sage-uke

subMoves.hiragana: ていしょう あわせうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward towards shōmen palm heel combined block in right zenkutsu-dachi. Palm heels are pushed up/down on a vertical line

moves.japaneseName: Hidari teishō chūdan oshi age-uke – migi teishō gedan oshi sage-uke

subMoves.hiragana: ていしょう あわせうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Combined palm heel block in left zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi teishō chūdan oshi age-uke – hidari teishō gedan oshi sage-uke

subMoves.hiragana: ていしょう あわせうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Combined palm heel block in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Into the center line to right low level ready position in back stance. Move forward and into center line

subMoves.hiragana: つかみうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ふどうだち
subMoves.description: Yori ashi (gliding forward) grasping block in immovable stance. In Nakayama's book called morote kokō gamae (tiger's mouth ready position). Stance before jump is fudō dachi (not kiba as in SKIF). Feet are on line in Empi, normally there is hip width between feet

moves.japaneseName: Jōhō kaiten tobi - migi chūdan shutō uke

subMoves.hiragana: じょうほう かいてんとび
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: High rotating jump with landing in back stance with right middle level knife hand block. KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Step back left middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Move the left foot and turn the right foot into Heisoku-dachi, left hand on left hip (back facing left), right fist touching the left palm (back of fist forward).

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
